description:
As a Database Engineering Manager, you'll work to enable the people and technology that keep Google running. Our team drives the technical projects, process improvements and automation that bring the Google magic to IT.

The Corporate Engineering team is the IT function at Google. We engineer and operate the internal systems that keep Google running. You're an experienced engineering leader who can drive and envision the engineering solutions responsible for running our financial and inventory management systems. You'll be responsible for the technical architecture as well as the system and database engineering solutions that deliver high availability and performance, and ensure that we over-deliver on capacity and scaling requirements. A primary goal for the team is to eliminate unnecessary reactive and repetitive work for the operations teams.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience with recruiting and managing a team of engineers managing SAP S/4 HANA infrastructure.
  • Experience managing performance tuning teams in a SAP S/4 HANA infrastructure.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in leading a team to improve its service engineering capabilities.
  • Track record in managing both systems engineering and database engineering teams within critical environments.
  • Ability to conduct technical deep-dives into databases, networking, operating systems and storage.
  • Ability to hold strategy discussions with Google's executive teams.
  • Demonstrated people management and communication skills in an innovative and ah-hoc environment.
responsibilities:
• Lead service engineering for Google's ERP SAP technology based systems including applications environment.
  • Own the design and engineering of the overall technical architecture to deliver highly reliable services.
  • Manage availability, scalability, performance and capacity from development through to production.
title: Database Engineering Manager
